text: Arau yadi ami iyaka anarabi bhasara kora'ana banalohemtena tente sihamte arasye ka’lehemtena, ‘iyara ayatasamuha bisadabharae bibrta horaa na'i kiya? Bhasa anarabiya, athaca raachula arabiya!’ Koraa, ‘e'ito muminasakalara babe hidayata arau araogya’. Yihamte imana posana nakarae sihamtara kanata ache badhirata arau kora'ane sihamtara (antarara) oparata andhatba srsti karaiba. Sihamtake'i ahbana karaa ha’ba durararti sthanara paraa
